title: BadLocationException thrown when using Fuzzer

milestone.description: Enhancements and bug fixes expected to be included in the next main release.

body:
With ZAP running, a BadLocationException is thrown when attempting to create a new Fuzzer and selecting an empty space in 'Fuzz Locations'. To reproduce:
1. Open Fuzzer
2. Click New Fuzzer and Select a Site
3. In the 'Fuzz Locations' Tab Click on an empty space and click the 'Add button'

A badlocation exception is thrown immediately and another one is closed when closing the pop-up windows. Listed below are the logs:

> Defaulting
> 
>  ZAP install dir to /Users/mustafa/git/zaproxy/bin/
